page.title: 13RECREATION IN KELHAM
page.content: Kelham is an area with a variety of recreation activties.They are:-tennis, football,cricket,assault course, gardening,fishing,reading,television viewing,playing musical instruments, walking,hunting,shooting,Youth Club and St.Wilfrid's Guild. The Youth Club is a favourite recreational pastime with the younger generation.Here children play space invaders,darts,table tennis,snooker, football and dance to a record player. There is also an exciting assault course at Kelham Hall. Favourite pastimes with the old include gardening and reading.They have easy access to the local lending library.The old also use the facilities of their own church club the St.Wilfrid's Guild.Older people also enjoy shooting game birds in the local woodlands.
